name: 翻譯賞析
restrict: ◎必須先修過【TIC9001  基礎口筆譯入門】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程介紹翻譯史上傑出的翻譯作品，並援引相關的翻譯理論，以引發學生對翻譯的興趣，並提升學生對翻譯的認知。
goals: 對中國近代翻譯史及翻譯理論有
能獨立判斷譯本品質及評估譯者的成就
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週，最後兩週為彈性上課】

1-7週為林俊宏老師授課，8-15週為余淑慧老師授課

Week 1

2/18

1.  引言：什麼是好的翻譯？從對等、功能到描述 

Week 2

2/25

1.  遇見美好的老譯本

Week 3

3/4

1.  譯評報告：目前市面上有哪些譯評？

Week 4

3/11

1.  電玩翻譯介紹與評析

Week 5

3/18

1.  歌曲翻譯

Week 6

3/25

1.  劇本翻譯 or 官樣文體翻譯 (TBD)

Week 7

4/1

1.  回譯：《京華煙雲》、《紫禁城的黃昏》、《狄公案》

Week 8

4/8

1.  Introduction to some important translation central issues concerning literary translation;
2.  Read Susan Bassnett’s “Specific problems of literary translation.”
3.  Assign homework (1)

Week 9

4/15

1.  Translating literature (1): Poetry
2.  Read Rabindranath Tagore’s _Stray Birds_ and its several Chinese translations.
3.  Homework (1) due.

Week 10

4/22

1.  Translating literature (2): Poetry
2.  Read Rabindranath Tagore’s _Stray Birds_ and its several Chinese translations.
3.  Discussion on homework (1).
4.  Assign homework (2).

Week 11

4/29

1.  Translating literature (3): Poetry
2.  Read Rabindranath Tagore’s _The Crescent Moon_ and its several Chinese translations.
3.  Homework (2) due.

Week 12

5/6

1.  Translating literature (4): Prose
2.  Read Ernest Hemingway’s _The Old Man and the Sea_ and its numerous Chinese translations;
3.  Discussion on homework (2)
4.  Assign homework (3)

Week 13

5/13

1.  Translating literature (5): Prose;
2.  Read Ernest Hemingway’s _The Old Man and the Sea_ and its numerous Chinese translations;
3.  Homework (3) due.

Week 14

5/20

1.  Translating literature (6): Prose + poetry
2.  Read Edith Hamilton’s _Mythology_ and its three Chinese translations;
3.  Discussion on homework (3).

Week 15

5/27

1.  Group report/Conclusion

Week 16

6/3

1.  Holiday(端午節)

Week 17

6/10

Week 18

6/17

(Note: This schedule is subjected to rearrangement.)

methodologies.note: 教師講述相關翻譯理論與概念、翻譯作品介紹與賞析
如有指定閱讀材料，學生需於上課前閱讀，並準備於課中討論
翻譯優劣的評定非一家之言，而是在溝通過程當中的建構，讓學生瞭解社會上可能對翻譯的看法
學生自選譯本進行翻譯批評，期末口頭報告與繳交書面報告

grading.note: 討論閱讀材料或指定譯本
期末口頭報告與繳交書面報告。文章格式不拘，中、英皆可，長度約五～十頁。

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【TIC9001  基礎口筆譯入門】
